SOURCE.name: DEBSCNO
SOURCE.COMAND: SELECT department_id, department_name, manager_id, location_id FROM DEPARTMENTS

TARGET.name: DCSCCNO
TARGET.COMAND: INSERT INTO STG_DEPARTMENTS (department_id, department_name, manager_id, location_id) VALUES #VALUES#

SOURCE.name: QACOM
SOURCE.COMAND: SELECT department_id, department_name, manager_id, location_id FROM STG_DEPARTMENTS

TARGET.name: QPEOPLE
TARGET.COMAND: INSERT INTO TARGET_DEPARTMENTS(department_id, department_name, manager_id, location_id) VALUES #VALUES#

SOURCE.name: QACOM
SOURCE.COMAND: SELECT country_id, country_name, region_id FROM COUNTRIES

TARGET.name: QPEOPLE
TARGET.COMAND: INSERT INTO STG_COUNTRIES (country_id, country_name, region_id) VALUES #VALUES#
